name: Brown Sugar Smokies
comments: This is a fabulous appetizer that will be eaten up quickly at any function.
instructions: Dredge bacon and smokies in sugar, then roll up smokies in bacon. Cover a plate with paper towels and place smokies seam side down on plate. Microwave on High 2 minutes. Place in 9x13"pan and bake at 350 degrees for 10 minutes. Top with more brown sugar and broil on High for 5 minutes.
